title: 服务器告示牌无法换行
author: zimzaza4
txt_content:
换行写的内容全部消失
Paper 1.16
后台：WARN] Player xxxxxx just tried to change non-editable sign

replies.author: Cheris
replies.txt_content: 先检测是否是插件问题，大概率是spigot.yml里面的相应内容应更改

replies.txt_content:
